author: Special Correspondent
text:
Anna University’s Centre for Entrepreneurship Development has organised a six-month free vocational training in air-conditioning and refrigerator technology for candidates who have passed class VIII.

In each batch 50 students will be accommodated. The course will begin in the third week of January and will be held from Monday to Friday from 6 p.m. to 8 p.m.

Applications may be obtained from the centre at the university’s Guindy campus. The last date for submission of forms is January 14.
title: Anna varsity offers free vocational training
